page.title: 16Games Children Play
page.content: In the World today people have more games than anything. We play Football, Cricket and Rounders. Some of us have Star Wars toys and some of us have board games. We play board games like Cluedo, Monopoly, Game of life and Chess. You play Cluedo like this. There are 5 suspects and you are one of them except one person. You sort out the cards into piles one for suspects one for implements and one for rooms. one person picks a card from each pile puts it in the black envolope but must not look at it. You put your suspect on a square that is the same colour as your suspect. You must move into rooms and make accusations. You must take it in turns to move. The idea of the game is to guess the murderer and the implement and room in which he\she commited the crime. ANDREW SYKES
